code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./UserList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UserList(_ref){let{users,addUser,deleteUser}=_ref;const[newUser,setNewUser]=useState({name:'',email:''});const handleAddUser=async()=>{if(!newUser.name||!newUser.email){alert('Please fill all user details.');return;}const success=await addUser(newUser);if(success){setNewUser({name:'',email:''});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Users"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"add-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Name",value:newUser.name,onChange:e=>setNewUser({...newUser,name:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:newUser.email,onChange:e=>setNewUser({...newUser,email:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleAddUser,children:"Add User"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list",children:users.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No users registered."}):users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[user.name," (",user.email,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteUser(user.id),children:"Delete"})]},user.id))})]});}export default UserList;
